articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT tonyolendo.eth
When I see paid testnets, what you're saying is you don't care about the global South. No one in the decision room knows what it means to not have a credit card, to pay a week's wages on gas fees, to have your access to USD limited due to forex controls and Western blacklisting

Patrick Collins 🌪: I think this summaries my stance on paid testnets.

Set a reminder now and join us here:
https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1vAxRAdVMakJl
Hint: we have a big announcement for all @developer_dao members 👀
